frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style layer defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and base background/foreground styling with dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Google Fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.

frontend/src/components/brand/BrandFoote: Footer showing a warm message, copyright, and caffeine.ai attribution with an accent heart icon.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandHeade: Sticky header presenting the cafe name and tagline with minimal warm styling.

frontend/src/components/media/CircularIm: Circular image component with loading state, placeholder fallback, and error handling.
Renders item badges plus a spice-level indicator using colored badges and flame icons.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuBook.ts: Manages page navigation, section transitions, and reduced-motion handling for the menu sections.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemCar: Displays a menu item with image, veg marker, badges, name, price, and description.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuPager.t: Navigation bar with prev/next buttons and page indicators for switching menu sections.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuSection: Renders a menu section with title, description, and animated item cards.
frontend/src/components/menu/VegNonVegMa: Small indicator showing vegetarian or non-vegetarian status via colored dot and border.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnE: Intersection-based reveal animation wrapper applying fade and slide-in effects.
frontend/src/components/motion/usePrefer: Hook detecting the user's reduced-motion preference via media queries.
frontend/src/features/menu/menuData.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for menu items and sections and provides a hardcoded list of menu sections with detailed items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth-client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers, custom CSS variables for theming, typography, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended theme settings, plugins, and animations.
